attributes.action: Require all MPs to request HM Customs and Revenue to carry out an investigation into each MPs expenses over the last 6 years and to treat each MP as if they were ordinary employees without any MP exemptions and for interest and penalties to be applied as normal with all results to be puplished by government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To recapture trust MPs must pay the tax and any penalty as would any  normal voter.Anything less would amount to a conspiracy including the revenue.As an ex member of enquiry branch I am appalled.I have recently stood down as the chairman of the general commissioners(tax Judges)In normal circumstances these fraudulent claims would be considered for criminal action.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
